title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Get Festive
content:
The skies and streets are filled with snow, bringing festivities and holiday spirit to GTA Online in droves.

Roam the powdered streets during the rare Los Santos snowfall and see citywide holiday decorations along with returning seasonal events like The Gooch, Weazel Plaza Shootout, and Yeti Hunt, which will also allow you to claim rewards from years past.
